name: Battle of the Five Man Bands
name_original: Battle of the Five Man Bands
description:
WIP Submission for GitHub Game-Off 2022.

Win the Battle of the Bands! Boost your team's hype, or drain the opponent's health to emerge victorious!

All feedback on the game's mechanics are welcome! If you didn't understand anything, let me know!

Music & background assets are temporary.

"Summon the Rawk" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
"Egmont Overture" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
